<sentence id="2310" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">

		<word type="VBG">Being</word>

	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">at</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">

		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">of</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="DT">a</word>

		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBZ">is</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="NP">

		<word type="NN">one</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBZ">takes</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">on</word>
			<word type="IN">with</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="DT">innocence—the</word>
			<word type="JJ">first</word>
			<word type="NN">time</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=".">.</word>
	</chink>
</sentence>
